title: Meeting to discuss design of I-80/380 interchange
content:
CORALVILLE (KWWL) - 

Tuesday evening you can get a look at the proposed changes for a busy interstate interchange in eastern Iowa.

According to the Iowa Department of Transportation, the I-80/380 interchange saw 477 crashes from 2004 to 2014. Six were fatal.

The DOT is holding a public information meeting to discuss proposed improvements. The DOT wants to change the current cloverleaf design, with its sharp curves, to a design more friendly to drivers.

The meeting runs from 5-6:30 p.m. at the Coralville Public Library.
